headline: Rocket Companies Completes $14.2B All-Stock Acquisition of Mr. Cooper
summary: RKT acquires Mr. Cooper in a $14.2B all-stock transaction, creating a mortgage powerhouse serving nearly 10M clients.

headline: Jim Cramer on Apollo Global: “This is the Toughest One for Me to Swallow”
summary: Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE:APO) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer was recently focused on. Cramer noted that the stock has been hit “much harder than the others,” as he remarked: “Finally, there’s Apollo Global Management. This is the toughest one for me to swallow.
